text:
@RealDeanCain My daughter just spent 14 hours in a full-faced respirator putting Covid-19 patients on ventilators.
She doesn't stop to eat or drink any more.
She knows many of these patients will not live.
She works until she is dripping with sweat.

If she can do it, you can do it.
